derivation: from a compound of a derivative of G1364 (διχοτομέω) and a derivative of (to cut);
strongs_def: to bisect, i.e. (by extension) to flog severely
outline:
1. to cut into two parts
    1. of the cruel method of punishment used by the Hebrews and others of cutting one in two
  2. cut up by scourging, scourge severely
